content: 10-1-08 i have corrected the pattern on my website but the word row needs to be removed from this section of rnds 4-7 work 1 single_crochet across to chain 2 space work **row** 1 single_crochet chain 2 1 single_crochet **note ** the pattern is written so that in round 9 you slip_stitch into a corner but i altered this when making the pattern myself and i slip_stitch into the center st of the short end of the base so that the seam goes up the side
